attributes.action: reduce petrol costs to below 100.0p and fix them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE (the citizens of this country) need to see a decrease in the petrol prices. Before long we shall have another fuel protest on our hands, its on the horizon. Something needs to be done and asap!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
